summary:
This mod adds 4 rings, one for the following bodies:
- UNP main
- UNP Skinny
- CBBE Curvy
- CBBE Slim
Equipping one of the 4 rings will change your current armors appearance with the Deathbell Princess Outfit
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][size=5]BASIC INFO[/size]
This mod adds 4 rings, one for the following bodies:
 - UNP main
 - UNP Skinny
 - CBBE Curvy
 - CBBE Slim
Equipping one of the 4 rings will change your current armors appearance with
the Deathbell Princess Outfit.

I also added a Deathbell Umbrella that works like a torch. You can only get it by following
the steps below:
- open console
- type "help umbrella 4" without the quotes
- type "player.additem <umbrella code> 1" without the quotes
- press enter

[center][size=5]CRAFTING[/size]
Recipe for Crafting:
- 7 pcs of Deathbells[/center]

[right][size=5]NOTE[/size]
If you are using Khajiit, Argonian or any other custom race and you are having
problems with the body, hands or feet not matching the head, you could just
equip-unequip-equip until it fix itself (may take up up to 3 tries or more)[/right]

[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
NMM or MO:
- download the file
- simply install

MANUAL:
- download main file
- extract files with winRAR
- copy all the files you extracted then paste it in your data folder
- open your SkyrimLauncher or whatever mod manager you are using
- activate the mod
- start skyrim and have fun

[center][size=5]VIDEO PREVIEW[/size]
[youtube]1aIHrCBDdTo[/youtube][youtube]pFARlER7lzk[/youtube][/center]
[/font]
author: Loshirai14
